author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: The Michael Abuah will deliver 🔥 https://t.co/PmLj1lwvc3

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: Yes the @knust_src is working for the students relentlessly. https://t.co/vEzY5EoYHk https://t.co/qmaIJji614

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: Congratulations to the @Mr_Sesah led @knust_src administration. The future cannot hold you great ones. https://t.co/MxnQXJrmJi

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: The KNUST- SRC makes the ordinary student the focus. The future-minded President @MichaelAbuah_  will do more. https://t.co/CPqGqVSdRk

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: Yesterday, I had the opportunity to join the @knust_src and the wonderful freshmen of @KNUSTGH at the #SRCFreshersOrientation . An insightful program it was and impactful too. I pray our freshmen live up to expectation to put @KNUSTGH at the top spot in West Africa. https://t.co/hAO66KYMJq

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: From 5th January through to 13th January, 2022, I joined volunteers from the @knust_src and  @GRASAGKNUST  to welcome our cherished international students at Kotoka International Airport and help them get to our beautiful @KNUSTGH Campus safely https://t.co/cowQZU3ae5

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: The working @knust_src, the working H.E @MichaelAbuah_ and the working Chief @ObiriyeboahOB Onto the next !! https://t.co/QXKgb4RcxW

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: As an SRC that puts its officers on their toes to deliver to the benefit of students, the AbuahReginald- led Admin puts out a binding Code of Conduct to regulate the affairs of its Officers. https://t.co/iD5kuU3gqP

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: I was sworn in as the 1st Special Initiatives Chairman of @knust_src. As a new Office, I promise to make it a relevant and reliable one to represent the interest of students in  @KNUSTGH for I have the faith to finish. Thank you H.E @MichaelAbuah_  for the opportunity to serve. https://t.co/zQwC3RnFkf

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: “When you make it, teach others how to do it”. Was privileged to be part of the Asanteman Past Students Association (ASAPSA-KNUST Chapter) to give back knowledge acquired to our final years awaiting their WASSCE https://t.co/ai0UCuVxOg

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: Officially handed over as the 5th Vice President of @CoHSSknust_ on 16th August, 2021. I am grateful to be part of the growth of our dear College and Association https://t.co/kjxFq5Lfva

author: Quainoo Raphael Jr.
text: The team and love @CoHSSknust_ gave me ❤️ https://t.co/EZfg9sUihb
